name: Nanite
tagline: A haskell-inspired language with Scheme macros. This language is as minimal as we can possebly get away with: Auto-curried true lambdas, booleans, conditions, strings, macros, and numbers. This language aims to be super productive for seasoned functional programmers, and blazingly fast and small.
